main event: A silver colored ball was observed high in the air near Hobart, Indiana on 7 August 1955.
interesting points: The object was seen moving erratically around the illumination of the Chicago skyline,The observation lasted approximately 10-15 minutes,The object was viewed through binoculars at various positions,No close attempts were made to track or photograph the object,The case concludes as 'insufficient data for evaluation.'
witness description: Civilian observer who noted the erratic movement of the object
